attributes.action: abolish the Financial Services Authority immediately and replace it with a body which can effectively regulate UK Banks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent turmoil in our financial industry has been hugely exacerbated by the irresponsible behaviour of the banks and completely ineffective regulation by the FSA.

The potential risks of the types of ‘derivatives’ – packaged debt trading – were highlighted by some as long ago as four years.
The FSA should have stepped in and stopped it straightaway, surely.

The British public now has no confidence in the FSA, and therefore immediate disbanding and replacement with a body which can properly and effectively regulate banks, and other financial institutions, must be the only option.
